About Us

With over 30 years of experience in handling personal injury cases, our team of personal injury lawyers will be with you every step of the way.

There are many personal injury attorneys in Texas, but there’s only one Texas Hammer. Over the past 30 years, our team of lawyers has offered professional legal representation to those involved in personal injury, auto and other types of accidents.

call us now

Toughest Accident lawyers in Texas
